ygData.subject: Re: General Question about getting items into invento ry.
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh my GAWD! What a fantastic and SIMPLE solution...  this will also be a fantastic answer for my fishing Troll! Bayne, Barbarian Shaman giddy with excitement.
ygData.messageBody:
Oh my GAWD!

What a fantastic and SIMPLE solution... this will also be a fantastic
answer for my fishing Troll!

Bayne, Barbarian Shaman giddy with excitement.
Vayne, Troll Shaman wallowing in hatred for himself for not figuring that
out himself.

Jay S Howard
Technical Recruiter
jhoward@...
http://www.arristech.com
602-957-3787


-->-----Original Message-----
-->From: Kevin King [mailto:kevink@...]
-->Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 11:17 AM
-->To: '_EQ_Magic@onelist.com'
-->Subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] General Question about getting items into
-->inventory.
-->
-->
-->From: Kevin King <kevink@...>
-->
-->> Is there an easier way to do this from the Wide screen?
-->>
-->> Bayne, Shaman Barbarian frusturated with the tediousness
-->of summoning
-->water.
-->
--> >>You can make an inventory spot a hot button. So put
-->that slot as a hot
--> >>button, and just drop it there.
--> >>Sonoroud, Dark Elf Nercomancer
-->
-->I also favor the approach of opening a bag and then doing my
-->summoning while it's sitting open on my main screen.
-->
-->-- Magistris, High Elf Magician
-->
